metadata.title: CVE-2023-38104 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
security update

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-38104` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gstreamer1.0-plugins-ugly - 1.22.5-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gst-plugins-ugly1.0 package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.22.5-1').
